section1.title: 1. Introduction
section1.content: Welcome to CyberLabs. By accessing and using our platform, you agree to be bound by these Terms and Conditions. If you do not agree with any part of these terms, please do not use our services.

section2.title: 2. Account Terms
section2.intro: When you create an account with us, you must provide accurate and complete information. You are responsible for:
section2.point1: Maintaining the security of your account and password
section2.point2: All activities that occur under your account
section2.point3: Notifying us immediately of any unauthorized use
section2.point4: Ensuring your account information is accurate and up-to-date

section3.title: 3. Acceptable Use
section3.intro: You agree not to use our platform to:
section3.point1: Violate any applicable laws or regulations
section3.point3: Transmit malicious code or harmful content
section3.point4: Attempt to gain unauthorized access to systems
section3.point5: Harass, abuse, or harm other users

section4.title: 4. Intellectual Property
section4.content: All content, features, and functionality on CyberLabs are owned by us and are protected by international copyright, trademark, and other intellectual property laws. You may not reproduce, distribute, or create derivative works without our express written permission.

section5.title: 5. Limitation of Liability
section5.content: CyberLabs and its affiliates will not be liable for any indirect, incidental, special, consequential, or punitive damages resulting from your use or inability to use the service. Our total liability shall not exceed the amount you paid us in the past 12 months.

section6.title: 6. Changes to Terms
section6.content: We reserve the right to modify these terms at any time. We will notify users of any material changes via email or through our platform. Continued use of our services after changes constitutes acceptance of the new terms.

section7.title: 7. Contact Us
section7.content: If you have any questions about these Terms and Conditions, please contact us:
